subject: Re: HD Speech – Project Progress & Stripe Setup

full_threads.body:
Hi Remona,

Confirming we have adjusted the body line height and the Stripe of text has been made smaller.

Hi Cindy,





Just regarding the updates, could this strip of text on our webpages be
made smaller ONLY on the mobile view? It is fairly large compared to the
content underneath. Also the body text spacing still is quite big, can we
make it smaller? Thanks

*Kind Regards,*



Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development
Assistant (CPSP) - *Hills District Speech Therapy *

[image: Background pattern Description automatically generated]

Website: www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au <http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/>

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Mon, Tues & Wed (9.00am – 3.00pm)

Social Media: [image: cidimage002.png@01D740EC.10392900]@hdspeechtherapy

From: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 11 June 2025 at 5:59 pm
To: Remona Mekdessi <remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Cc: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>, Yasemin <
yasemin@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Subject: Re: HD Speech – Project Progress & Stripe Setup

Hi Remona!



I just wanted to check in to see if the Stripe integration is working
properly on your website and if there are any issues you'd like us to
assist with.

We’ve also made the following updates based on your recent requests:

- Updated the form text as specified
- Adjusted the mobile dropdown menu for better usability
- Completed all items submitted through the support ticket

For testing purposes, please use the following sample subscriber account:

- https://staging-hdspeechtherapy.kinsta.cloud/login/
- joel@wolfiq.com.au
- (l6e9$k&pYQ4Q4VhM^)eDp@%

Once you’ve reviewed and approved the updates on the staging site, we’ll
proceed with implementing the changes on the live site. Following that,
we’ll import the LearnDash accounts as discussed.

Please let us know if everything looks good or if you need any further
adjustments.



On Tue, Jun 10, 2025 at 10:40 AM Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>
wrote:

Thanks for confirming, Remona.



I have sent an invite to you and Yasemin.



See you later!

remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au> wrote:

From: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Monday, 9 June 2025 at 3:33 pm
To: Remona Mekdessi <remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Cc: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: HD Speech – Project Progress & Stripe Setup

Hi Remona,

Just reaching out to share an update on our progress with HD Speech.

We’ve completed several items on our list, and in the process of adding
Learndash accounts to the website.



Regarding the Stripe setup, it would be best to schedule a meeting where
you can share your screen with our development team. This will allow us to
guide you through the setup process without needing access to your account.

Let us know a convenient time for you.



--

Items completed:

- Replace staff portal login with Learn Dash login page
- Hide download/print icons for PMP course PDFs in Learn Dash
- Adjust image compression to lossless setting *Done in real time
- Adjust line height for improved mobile readability of page titles
- Fix mobile menu navigation double-tap issues

--



*Error! Filename not specified.*

Cindy Valderama

Project Manager

cindy@wolfiq.com.au
